name: Virtual Happy Family Dad Games
description:
Get ready to play the role of father figure in the virtual family simulator household, perform all the household activities & take care of your family. Comfort your family by playing the levels of happy family simulator, help your family in day to day activities. A complete family simulation of a happy family compiled in a single package with multiple day to day real life tasks, Download now to have unlimited fun the 3D characters in the virtual family game.


Features of Happy Family Simulator:
High quality graphics
Details 3D models of virtual dad
Amusing sound effects throughout the game
Engaging story life with multiple timelines
Challenging and amazing tasks
